# Reading and Tidying the data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

## Playing with March Madness data from 2024 tournament

### Webscraping the data & Cleaning

```{r}
url <- "https://www.barttorvik.com/#"
```

```{r}
marchMadness <- 
  url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  html_table(trim = TRUE, header = FALSE) %>%
  .[[1]] %>%
  .[-1,] %>%
  .[-27,] %>%
  .[-52,] %>%
  .[-77,] %>%
  .[-102,] %>%
  .[-127,] %>%
  .[-152,]

marchMadness
```
